sqlMap.sql: SELECT ID, PUBNUM_NUM, TEMP_NAME, DES, POSITION, STATUS FROM PUBNUM_PAGE_TEMP WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if pubnumNum?exists && pubnumNum!=""> And PUBNUM_NUM=:pubnumNum </#if> <#if tempName?exists && tempName!=""> And TEMP_NAME=:tempName </#if> <#if des?exists && des!=""> And DES=:des </#if> <#if position?exists && position!=""> And POSITION=:position </#if> <#if status?exists && status!=""> And STATUS=:status </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO PUBNUM_PAGE_TEMP (PUBNUM_NUM, TEMP_NAME, DES, POSITION, STATUS) VALUES ( :pubnumNum, :tempName, :des, :position, :status)
UPDATE PUBNUM_PAGE_TEMP SET PUBNUM_NUM = :pubnumNum, TEMP_NAME = :tempName, DES = :des, POSITION = :position, STATUS = :status WHERE ID = :id

SELECT ID, PAGETEMP_ID, PLAY_MODE, IMAGE_SRC, LINK, IMG_ORDER FROM PUBNUM_AD WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if pageTempId?exists && pageTempId!=""> And PAGETEMP_ID=:pageTempId </#if> <#if playMode?exists && playMode!=""> And PLAY_MODE=:playMode </#if> <#if imageSrc?exists && imageSrc!=""> And IMAGE_SRC=:imageSrc </#if> <#if link?exists && link!=""> And LINK=:link </#if> <#if imgOrder?exists && imgOrder!=""> And IMG_ORDER=:imgOrder </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO PUBNUM_AD (PAGETEMP_ID, PLAY_MODE, IMAGE_SRC, LINK, IMG_ORDER) VALUES ( :pageTempId, :playMode, :imageSrc, :link, :imgOrder)
UPDATE PUBNUM_AD SET PLAY_MODE = :playMode, IMAGE_SRC = :imageSrc, LINK = :link, IMG_ORDER = :imgOrder WHERE ID = :id

SELECT ID, PAGETEMP_ID, MSTYLE, IMAGE_SRC, LINK, POSITION FROM PUBNUM_ACTIVITY WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if pageTempId?exists && pageTempId!=""> And PAGETEMP_ID=:pageTempId </#if> <#if mStyle?exists && mStyle!=""> And MSTYLE=:mStyle </#if> <#if imageSrc?exists && imageSrc!=""> And IMAGE_SRC=:imageSrc </#if> <#if link?exists && link!=""> And LINK=:link </#if> <#if position?exists && position!=""> And POSITION=:position </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO PUBNUM_ACTIVITY ( PAGETEMP_ID, MSTYLE, IMAGE_SRC, LINK, POSITION) VALUES ( :pageTempId, :mStyle, :imageSrc, :link, :position)
UPDATE PUBNUM_ACTIVITY SET MSTYLE = :mStyle, IMAGE_SRC = :imageSrc, LINK = :link, POSITION = :position WHERE ID = :id
